snippet.title: Guncar Arena Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Guncar Arena is an 80s inspired roguelite vehicular combat bullet hell arena shooter coming to steam! Demo out now!
#gaming #gameplay #indiegame #pixelart #roguelike 
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2131330/Guncar_Arena/ and follow on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/GuncarArena
